####################################################################################################################
#                                                                                                                  #
#                                                                                                                  #
#                                                                                                                  #
# This is the configure one or more Geo Regions to process and get Recon Instruments Map in RECON TILE format.     #
#                                                                                                                  #
# You can select one or more Geo Regions to process it (by removing the comment sign '#').                         #
#                                                                                                                  #
# It ignores all of the comment line that starts with sign '#'                                                     #
#                                                                                                                  #
# Each Geo Region format: GEO_REGION_NAME; left_longitude; bottom_latitude; right_longitude; top_latitude          #
#                                                                                                                  #
#                                                                                                                  #
#                                                                                                                  #
####################################################################################################################

#["'Canada_Middle_Area'", -136.0, 53.0, -56.0, 57.0]
#[Canada_Middle_Area1     ; -136.000000;  53.000000; -128.536616;  57.000000]
